titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Interior to convey the Garrison Diversion Unit Project Oakes Test Area in Dickey County, North Dakota, to the Dickey-Sargent Irrigation District, and for other purposes.
Garrison Diversion Unit Project Oakes Test Area Conveyance Act of 2019
Garrison Diversion Unit Project Oakes Test Area Conveyance Act of 2019
Garrison Diversion Unit Project Oakes Test Area Conveyance Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Water and Power. Hearings held.
